title: Ticket #5938: $F macro should support win paths and path completion
description:
The $F macro expansion should have more capabilities. it should be able to

  • f convert relative paths to full paths by prefixing the current working directory (submit only)
  • dd allow extraction of more than just the last directory in the path (i.e. a counting 'd' option)
  • w convert path separators to windows style
  • u convert path separators to unix style
  • b allow extraction of last dir or extension without the \ or .
  • a allow wrapping the result in single quotes as well as double quotes
remarks: assigned to Kent for review of documentation.
